name: Build and Deploy Jemdoc

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main  # 或者是 master，取决于你的主分支名字

permissions:
  contents: read
  pages: write
  id-token: write

concurrency:
  group: "pages"
  cancel-in-progress: true

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: '3.x'

      - name: Build Site
        run: |
          # 给予脚本执行权限
          chmod +x jemdoc.py
          # 编译所有 jemdoc 文件 (Linux下支持通配符)
          python jemdoc.py -c mysite.conf *.jemdoc
          
      - name: Upload artifact
        uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3
        with:
          path:. # 上传当前目录下的所有文件（包含生成的 HTML）

  deploy:
    environment:
      name: github-pages
      url: ${{ steps.deployment.outputs.page_url }}
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: build
    steps:
      - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
        id: deployment
        uses: actions/deploy-pages@v4
